items.name: Skin of the Lords
explicitMods: You can only Socket Corrupted Gems in this item
flavourText: The Lords are chosen so carefully.
Only they may grace His flesh.

socketedItems.typeLine: Divergent Cast when Damage Taken Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 69 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3142 total Damage from Hits
Supported Skills require 16% reduced amount of Damage taken to Trigger
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have +150% to Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies.
explicitMods: Second form has 600% increased Critical Strike Chance
Second form has +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Second form has 300% more Projectile Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: Ward does not Break during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Dusk Stride
enchantMods: 18% reduced Mana Cost of Skills if you've been Hit Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 26% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 19% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% reduced Area of Effect
Supported Skills have 19% increased Aura effect
Non-Curse Auras from Supported Skills have 10% increased Effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you

explicitMods: Adds 6 to 16 Cold Damage to Attacks
craftedMods: 6% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
explicitMods: Deals 2447.9 Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods:
Sacrifices 60% of your total Energy Shield and Life
Deals 158% of Sacrificed Energy Shield and Life as Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
hybrid.secDescrText: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is increased while under this effect.

items.name: Heartbound Loop
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
420 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

items.name: The Annihilating Light
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills

than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Create a wall of fire for a duration, which deals burning damage to everything in its area. Each enemy that enters the wall also receives a secondary burning debuff which persists for a short duration after leaving the wall. Any projectiles fired through the wall by you and allies deal added fire damage and apply the wall's secondary debuff on hit.
explicitMods: Deals 679.9 Base Fire Damage per second
Secondary Debuff Deals 2266.4 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
Maximum 3 Flame Walls at a time
Projectiles which pass through the wall deal 78 to 117 Added Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Recalls all minions that are following you to your location, and grants them a temporary life regeneration effect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Crystallised Omniscience
explicitMods: Modifiers to Attributes instead apply to Omniscience
+1% to all Elemental Resistances per 15 Omniscience
Attribute Requirements can be satisfied by 23% of Omniscience
flavourText: That winter, scorched refugees emerged from the shrine,
speaking only in strange tongues. They prayed to a new
symbol of power, not out of love, but out of fear.
